Class ApiExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.advice.ApiExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class ApiExceptionHandler extends Object
Api exception handler.

    • handleAllExceptions

      @ExceptionHandler(java.lang.Exception.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorApi> handleAllExceptions(Exception ex)
      Handles unhandled exceptions and returns a structured error response.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception that provides the error message for the response.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an ErrorApi object, status 500 Internal Server Error, and includes a timestamp, status, error name, and message.

    • handleMethodArgumentNotValid

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorApi> handleMethodArgumentNotValid(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException ex)
      Handles validation errors for method arguments.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception with validation errors.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with an ErrorApi object, status 400 Bad Request, and validation error details.
